long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool helps capture relative xPath by labeling search box, products and pagination links in a website, which automatically captures and generates a relative xPath instead of the usual absolute xPath. This completely eliminates writing xPath manually for a pre-defined set of datapoints.

Note: This extension is available only for a few restricted users, so please mail me at smpodev@gmail.com to get access, explaining why you need access to the extension.
